title: A little change for Zac?
body:
I have been thinking a little about our lovely pile of goo. No doubt the Cinderhulk change has definitely helped him greatly, but I just think he could get one last push.

We all know his hidden passive makes him bigger with more HP. More HP = more goo. Pretty neat, yes?

Now I thought: More goo should probably mean more weight, am I right?

Then, why not making his E scale off HP or bonus HP instead of AP? The bigger Zac actually is, the more it hurts to be hit by him after he launches himself in the air.

I have no numbers to balance, just thought this could be a cool thing to be had :3

replies.body: cool thematic idea, but he would need to have it scale with his secret passive, not his actual health, because he actually gets smaller when he has less than his base health. If it scaled with his current health, it would fit pretty close thematically, but that could end up being a pretty big nerf in the end.

Damn, that's actually quite accurate.

But I don't think Riot has ever actually introduced any mechanic scaling with _your_ current HP. Most I've seen was %missing HP from Olaf or Tryn, but nothing actually scales with current HP at the moment. It would become quite a challenge to balance something like that out to make it usable in those clutchy fights when everyone is low.

What if it scaled off 8% of Zac's health?

Like, he has at level 1 is 615 so it would start around +49 damage. And at level 18, he has 2230 so it would go up to +178 damage. If you can get him up to 3000 health, then he could deal 240 and at 4000 health he'd deal 320 damage. If we add this with his AP damage which goes to at most 200 AP, his AP dealing +140, then it can go up to +660 damage +280 for a total of +940 damage. It wouldn't be too powerful and it will be for only late game.
940+base dmg on a 1300 range CC ability...wut
Well, it's late game. It deals a lot if hit. The ability can be easily avoided, stopped, and has its own draw-backs. Why not?
Tarics q scars off hp. Sej w scales off hp braums q scales off up. Hell garens passive and mundos passive technically scales off hp
Yes, but its their _maximum HP_. What he had suggested was _current HP_ (meaning the less you have, the less damage you deal). Those abilities do not exist yet.
Well kinda if you want to count olafs passive lol. But he would be easy to beat if it was current hp . a % of max hp or bonus hp would be better

Olaf's passive scales with current HP.
So does Maw of Malmortius.

The less HP you have, more attack speed/attack damage you gain.
I'd like to say that item works well on Olaf, but let's be real.
Nothing works well on Olaf.
That means they scale with *missing* HP, not current HP, and they don't even scale directly.

It would probably be best if it scaled with bonus/max health because it if scaled with current health then it either is very strong when Zac engages with his E or it because really useless if he does his job and takes damage and then is able to use it again

That's my point entirely, if we were changing this for the sake of thematics, then it *would* deal less damage when he is below his base HP, just like how he shrinks down when low. That is why I said it would be cool thematically but probably a nerf in the end.

Well you could go this way
Current health is weaker then max health so therefor we can give it a higher number (though of course this would make his initiate when he is on full HP possibly hit way too much and would probably be nerfed/removed)
Am I the only one who thinks he is extremely strong? They shouldn't buff him in anyway anymore, that would make him broken.
I thought he was pretty decent before cinderhulk, but like {{champion:111}} he needs a team that will play with his strengths.
Just like Cho'Gath's Vorpal Spikes? That'd be awesome.
Well then you nerf the AP zac playstyle, not cool man. I like my playstyles and build diversity. :U

Zac has ass for ap scalings, which is why things like {{item:3001}} and {{item:3151}} are built on him. He is mostly base damage, which is why turning his E into HP scalings shouldn't phase you if you still build magic pen.

And yes, I'm pretty sure your joking.

Zac's E has a 120% AP scaling.

His E has a 70% scaling.

If his ratios were bad ( e.g {{champion:36}} )

{{item:3001}} wouldn't be built on him, because it would be a waste of AP. Better build {{item:3065}}.

It also has a minimum of 12 seconds on cooldown, he relies on his QWR for damage, not his E that is for initiating. All of his other abilities have crap scalings (50 being the highest) pushing you in the direction of magic pen {{item:3151}}. Also, {{item:3001}} isn't necessarily for the Ap, but the mr shred that works great with {{item:3068}} or {{item:3725}} with a {{item:3075}}.
But muh magic penetration!
